results.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 3220 / Ryzen 3 1200 / AMD FX6300 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 730 / Radeon R7 240 / Intel HD Graphics 620 (SM 6.0) or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection : Required for game activation, optional for game updates and cloud saves.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: i3 4130 / Ryzen 3 1300X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 / Radeon RX 550 (SM 6.0) or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection : Required for game activation, optional for game updates and cloud saves. For best experience we recommend the following aspect ratios and resolutions -Common 16:9 resolutions: 1280x720, 1600x900, 1920x1080, 2560x1440, 3840x2160. -Common 16:10 resolutions: 1280x800, 1440x900, 1680x1050, 1920×1200 -Common 21:9 resolutions: 2560x1080, 3440x1440.
